# Vendor Analysis: Lambda Labs

## Overview
A specialized AI infrastructure provider that builds both hardware (workstations/servers) and cloud clusters.

## Economic & Operational Profile
- **Founded:** 2012.
- **Employees:** ~500 - 700.
- **Funding:** $480M Series D in Feb 2025.
- **Partnerships:** Strategic partnership with VAST Data.

## Economic Risk Analysis
Lambda is a "Gold Standard" specialized provider. It has a long history (pre-dating the current AI boom) and massive recent funding. It is one of the lowest-risk non-hyperscale options.

## Gaussian Risk Variable
**$\sigma_{risk}$ = 0.22** (Low-Moderate)
*Confidence Interval: [0.18, 0.26]*
High stability and proven track record in both hardware and cloud.
